title: The Amazing Power of Ashur Fine
description: Ashur Fine is no typical high school kid. Ashur possesses the Power. He can become any person, living or dead, by simply wishing to be. With the Power on his side, Ashur sets out to find the culprit who mugged Aunt Ruth. But the tables turnâ€”and soon it's Ashur himself who's being stalked! The adventure leads Ashur smack into the middle of an international plot!
author: Donald J. Sobol
